Campfire Gala

Dear Friends,

We recently sent you an invitation to one of the most anticipated UniCamp events of the year, the Annual Campfire Gala. Since then, the concerns around the spread of COVID-19 has escalated dramatically with major events and gatherings being cancelled. Out of an abundance of caution, UCLA UniCamp will be following suit and postpone the Gala until Fall. We feel this is in the best interest of all our supporters and community members. 

We hope to find an alternative, digital way to entertain you with camp songs and games as we get closer to our 86th summer camp season (and 20th year at Camp River Glen!). 

For those who have already purchased tickets, you may request a refund or choose to defer the ticket once a new gala date has been set. We will be reaching out to you individually.

Until then – stay tuned, stay safe, stay Woodsey!

– The UCLA UniCamp Family

UCLA UniCamp is a program of University Camps, Inc.
